org.lindbergframework.beans.di.context
Interface BeanFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractBeanFactory, AnnotationBeanFactory
public interface BeanFactory

Interfaces that defines a factory that creates and returns bean instances with dependencies solved and injected.

Author:
Victor Lindberg

getBean

<E> E getBean(java.lang.String id,
              java.lang.Object... constructorArgs)
          throws BeanNotFoundException
Get a instance bean from lindberg IOC context.

Type Parameters:
E - type of bean expected.
Parameters:
id - bean id.
constructorArgs - bean contructor args.
Returns:
instance of bean.
Throws:
BeanNotFoundException - bean with specified id not found.
